instructions.name: postUpdateAtomic
docs: Post a price update using a VAA and a MerklePriceUpdate.
This function allows you to post a price update in a single transaction.

Compared to `post_update`, it only checks whatever signatures are present in the provided VAA and doesn't fail if the number of signatures is lower than the Wormhole quorum of two thirds of the guardians.
The number of signatures that were in the VAA is stored in the `VerificationLevel` of the `PriceUpdateV2` account.
We recommend using `post_update_atomic` with 5 signatures. This is close to the maximum signatures you can verify in one transaction without exceeding the transaction size limit.
# Warning
Using partially verified price updates is dangerous, as it lowers the threshold of guardians that need to collude to produce a malicious price update.

accounts.name: guardianSet
docs: Instead we do the same steps in deserialize_guardian_set_checked.

accounts.name: priceUpdateAccount
docs: The constraint is such that either the price_update_account is uninitialized or the write_authority is the write_authority.
Pubkey::default() is the SystemProgram on Solana and it can't sign so it's impossible that price_update_account.write_authority == Pubkey::default() once the account is initialized

instructions.name: postUpdate
docs: Post a price update using an encoded_vaa account and a MerklePriceUpdate calldata.
This should be called after the client has already verified the Vaa via the Wormhole contract.
Check out target_chains/solana/cli/src/main.rs for an example of how to do this.

accounts.name: priceUpdateAccount
docs: The constraint is such that either the price_update_account is uninitialized or the write_authority is the write_authority.
Pubkey::default() is the SystemProgram on Solana and it can't sign so it's impossible that price_update_account.write_authority == Pubkey::default() once the account is initialized

instructions.name: postTwapUpdate
docs: Post a TWAP (time weighted average price) update for a given time window.
This should be called after the client has already verified the VAAs via the Wormhole contract.
Check out target_chains/solana/cli/src/main.rs for an example of how to do this.

accounts.name: twapUpdateAccount
docs: The constraint is such that either the price_update_account is uninitialized or the write_authority is the write_authority.
Pubkey::default() is the SystemProgram on Solana and it can't sign so it's impossible that price_update_account.write_authority == Pubkey::default() once the account is initialized

errors.name: InvalidWormholeMessage
errors.msg: Received an invalid wormhole message

errors.name: DeserializeMessageFailed
errors.msg: An error occurred when deserializing the message

errors.name: InvalidPriceUpdate
errors.msg: Received an invalid price update

errors.name: UnsupportedMessageType
errors.msg: This type of message is not supported currently

errors.name: InvalidDataSource
errors.msg: The tuple emitter chain, emitter doesn't match one of the valid data sources.

errors.name: InsufficientFunds
errors.msg: Funds are insufficient to pay the receiving fee

errors.name: FeedIdMismatch
errors.msg: Cannot calculate TWAP, end slot must be greater than start slot

errors.name: ExponentMismatch
errors.msg: The start and end messages must have the same feed ID

errors.name: InvalidTwapSlots
errors.msg: The start and end messages must have the same exponent

errors.name: InvalidTwapStartMessage
errors.msg: Start message is not the first update for its timestamp

errors.name: InvalidTwapEndMessage
errors.msg: End message is not the first update for its timestamp

errors.name: TwapCalculationOverflow
errors.msg: Overflow in TWAP calculation

errors.name: WrongWriteAuthority
errors.msg: This signer can't write to price update account

errors.name: WrongVaaOwner
errors.msg: The posted VAA account has the wrong owner.

errors.name: DeserializeVaaFailed
errors.msg: An error occurred when deserializing the VAA.

errors.name: InsufficientGuardianSignatures
errors.msg: The number of guardian signatures is below the minimum

errors.name: InvalidVaaVersion
errors.msg: Invalid VAA version

errors.name: GuardianSetMismatch
errors.msg: Guardian set version in the VAA doesn't match the guardian set passed

errors.name: InvalidGuardianOrder
errors.msg: Guardian signature indices must be increasing

errors.name: InvalidGuardianIndex
errors.msg: Guardian index exceeds the number of guardians in the set

errors.name: InvalidSignature
errors.msg: A VAA signature is invalid

errors.name: InvalidGuardianKeyRecovery
errors.msg: The recovered guardian public key doesn't match the guardian set

errors.name: WrongGuardianSetOwner
errors.msg: The guardian set account is owned by the wrong program

errors.name: InvalidGuardianSetPda
errors.msg: The Guardian Set account doesn't match the PDA derivation

errors.name: GuardianSetExpired
errors.msg: The Guardian Set is expired

errors.name: GovernanceAuthorityMismatch
errors.msg: The signer is not authorized to perform this governance action

errors.name: TargetGovernanceAuthorityMismatch
errors.msg: The signer is not authorized to accept the governance authority

errors.name: NonexistentGovernanceAuthorityTransferRequest
errors.msg: The governance authority needs to request a transfer first

errors.name: ZeroMinimumSignatures
errors.msg: The minimum number of signatures should be at least 1
